review:
Tastes great. Have Choco Fills inside with way better than cream biscuits.  
  
Additionally, I would call it a Luxury Biscuits. Definitely recommended for a
kitty party or smaller house party.  
  
Also, I would like provide disclaimer advice as well -please don't eat too
much at a time as this might increase your diabetic level.

This is a rich chocolate cookies which has a really really gooey chocolate
filled in the center. The outer layer of the cookies is so crisp and interior
is so molten with dark chocolate..I am damn sure that you will love it from
the first bite itself..

Date of expiry has been stickered. So how do I know whether the product is
fresh or old?

This choco filly are so creamy that my day gone wonderful i like it tasty full
of cream inside i like it and i got this product delivered in one day next day
i got this product delivered and the services are good of amazon my trusted
site#Amazon 😊Happy costumer

Was damaged

Bad handling as the box is open from a side and a sticker is there on the
expiry date section

I just checked the Price It is Rs 25 and They are selling it over priced, Rs
30 Unbearable...

Sunfeast Dark Fantasy is the favorite biscuit of me and my whole family. We
all just love the texture, the taste, the way it dissolves in the mouth. The
only thing we're dissatisfied with is the price which should be lesser than
its original. However, thanks to Amazon Pantry we are able to buy these
biscuits in a much cheaper price.

The product was in good condition and no biscuits were damaged.I didn't like
much the taste of biscuits, but it may be due to the reason that I am not a
big fan of chocolate. Otherwise good. If you like the chocolate, then go for
it. I got it for only Rs. 24

It's very bad product even there no returns available my pantry box is also
torn when I was received it. Even the executive was talking very rudely when i
was called him Don't deserve a single star wasting of money.
